summary: Become a true master of your skills.
descriptionHtml:
This will be a simple mod to upgrade the perks you earn to the level of a master in that skill.

+++++++++++++
Description
+++++++++++++
-Armsman, Barbarian, Juggernaut, Enchanter, Alchemist, Light Fingers, Agile Defender, & Overdraw perks curve from a 10%-30%-75%-150%-300% bonus.
-Shield Wall & Stealth perks curve from a 10%-20%-30%-50%-80% bonus.
-Haggling perk curves from a 10%-15%-25%-50%-75% bonus.
-Bladesman, Deep Wounds, & Critical Shot have 15%-25%-50% chances to do crits.
-Bone Breaker & Skull Crusher ignore 33%-66%-99% of armor.
-Savage Strike & Devastating Blow do 50% bonus damage.
-Hunters Discipline recovers 90% of arrows.
-Matching Set (light & heavy) give a 50% bonus.
-Arcane Blacksmith lowered to only 30 Smithing requirement.
-Atromancy & Necromancy give double duration & require 35 Conjuration.
-Dark Souls & Elemental Potency require 45 Conjuration.
-Twin souls has 2 ranks; 1st is original @ 60 Conjuration, & 2nd is 5 summons @ 100 Conjuration.
-Augmented Flames/Frost/Shock give 50%-100% bonuses.
-Added Flame/Frost/Storm Master that give 50% cost reduction @ 70 Destruction.
-Intense Flames, Deep Freeze, & Incinerate require 90 Destruction but work at 50% or less health.
-Necromage gives 50% more power and double duration.
-Ward Absorb absorbs 70% of spells
-Stability gives 150% longer duration
-Fire/Frost/Storm/Insightful Enchanter give 50% bonus.
-Corpus Enchanter gives 75% bonus.
-Extra Effect has 2 ranks; 1st is original @ 50 Enchanting, & 2nd is 3 enchantments @ 100 Enchanting.
-Soul Siphon fully recharges on any kill @ 90 Enchanting.

++++
1.0
++++
-Most base Perks are given a curve from 10% to 300% bonus (except sneak, speachcraft, lockpicking, shields, and novice magics)
-More crits from swords, greatswords, and bows
-Maces and Warhammers ignore more armor
-Improved power attacks\' power
-Improved Hunters Discipline
-Improved Matching Set perks
-lowered Arcane Blacksmith requirements
-Evened out conjuration between atronachs and reanimation
-More Twin Souls for conjuring
-Improved Augmented Destruction perks
-Added Fire, Frost and Storm Mastery perks
-Improved Disintegrate, Deep Freeze, and Intense Flames (destruction)
-Improved Necromage and Ward Absorb (restoration)
-Improved Stability (illusion)
-Improved Enchanting effects
-More Extra Effects for enchanting
-Improved Soul Siphon

++++++++++++++
Instalation
++++++++++++++
Just place \"Master of the Art.esp\" to the \"/Skyrim/data\" folder.
